game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Save the princess from the evil dragon
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by a fearsome dragon. Embark on a dangerous journey to rescue her and bring peace to the kingdom.

task.description: In order to defeat the dragon, you will need a legendary sword. Find the ancient ruins and retrieve the sword.
The dragon has captured several knights who tried to save the princess before you. Free the knights from the dragon's lair.
Facing the dragon will not be easy. Gather your courage and confront the dragon in its lair.
Finally, rescue the princess from the clutches of the dragon and bring her back to the kingdom.
